name: Kerdak Bonefist

specials.name: Bravery
specials.description: When Kerdak rolls a success on a Will save against a fear effect, he gets a critical success instead. In addition, anytime he gains the frightened condition, reduce its value by 1.

specials.name: Sea Legs
specials.description: Kerdak ignores difficult terrain (but not greater difficult terrain) caused by water.

specials.name: Persevering Reload
specials.description: Requirements Kerdak's last action was to make a successful Strike with his pistol and his pistol is unloaded; Effect Kerdak Interacts to reloads his pistol

specials.name: Pistol Twirl
specials.description: Kerdak spins his pistol with a performative flair. Kerdak Feints against an opponent within 30 feet of him. On a success or critical success, the foe is flat-footed against his melee and ranged attacks. On a critical failure, he is flat-footed against the target's melee and ranged attacks.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: Kerdak's Strikes deal 4d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
